data.DescriptionHtml: This spell functions like consumptive field, except that the field affects all creatures in the area with 9 hit points or fewer that fail their saving throw die, and creatures that fall to 9 hit points or lower in the area after the spell is cast are likewise subject to its effect.
data.Name: Consumptive Field, Greater
data.Rulebook: Libris Mortis: The Book of the Dead
